exec: // Get selected environment name (undefined if none is selected)
// Get token environment variable value (undefined if none exists or if current value is empty)
throw new Error(`No environment containing a ${variableName} variable has been selected`);
throw new Error(`Selected environment (${selectedEnvironment}) does not contain a ${variableName} variable`);
throw new Error(`Selected environment (${selectedEnvironment}) contains a ${variableName} variable but its current value is empty`);
throw new Error(`Selected environment (${selectedEnvironment}) contains a ${variableName} variable but its current value doesn't start with '-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----' as expected`);
const body = (pm.request.body != null && pm.request.body.raw != null) ? pm.request.body.raw : '{}';
var signedToken = KJUR.jws.JWS.sign(header.alg, sHeader, sPayload, fireblocksSecretKey);
